original_text: When he hath made plain the face thereof, doth he not cast abroad the fitches, and scatter the cummin, and cast in the principal wheat and the appointed barley and the rie in their place?
korean_text: 지면을 이미 평평히 하였으면 소회향을 뿌리며 대회향을 뿌리며 소맥을 줄줄이 심으며 대맥을 정한 곳에 심으며 귀리를 그 가에 심지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: When he hath made plain the face thereof,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 표면을 평탄하게 만들었을 때,

sentences.original_text: doth he not cast abroad the fitches,
and cast in the principal wheat
and the rie in their place?
